## Warmup Complete

I've explored the codebase and have a solid understanding of the project structure:

### Project Overview

This is **fotesco.dev** - a personal portfolio website built with:

- **Framework**: Next.js 15 with App Router
- **Language**: TypeScript
- **Styling**: Tailwind CSS v4
- **Content**: MDX for blog posts and project documentation
- **Deployment**: Vercel

### Key Directory Structure

```
/Users/dfotesco/Portfolio/portfolio/
├── src/
│   ├── app/           # Next.js App Router pages
│   │   ├── blog/      # Blog routes
│   │   ├── projects/  # Projects routes
│   │   └── api/       # API routes
│   ├── components/    # React components (ui/, common/, sections/)
│   ├── lib/           # Utilities (content.ts, metadata.ts, utils.ts)
│   └── types/         # TypeScript type definitions
├── content/
│   ├── blog/          # MDX blog posts
│   └── projects/      # MDX project documentation
├── docs/              # Project documentation
└── public/            # Static assets
```

### Architecture Highlights

1. **Content System**: MDX-based with frontmatter for metadata
2. **SEO**: Comprehensive metadata generation with JSON-LD structured data
3. **Components**: Organized into ui/, common/, and sections/ subdirectories
4. **Performance**: Static generation, lazy loading, dynamic imports

### Critical Files for Implementation

- `/Users/dfotesco/Portfolio/portfolio/src/lib/content.ts` - Content loading and parsing logic
- `/Users/dfotesco/Portfolio/portfolio/src/app/layout.tsx` - Root layout with global providers
- `/Users/dfotesco/Portfolio/portfolio/src/components/ui/` - Reusable UI components
- `/Users/dfotesco/Portfolio/portfolio/docs/ARCHITECTURE.md` - Architecture documentation
- `/Users/dfotesco/Portfolio/portfolio/package.json` - Dependencies and scripts

Ready for the next task.
